TopicTitle: A way to see survey location while flying?

Articles.Content: Well as I restarted ksp again after a hiatus of several years I am now at the point where I remember a vital mod. Yet I can't seem to find it for 1.7.3. - It was a mod that showed (while flying, so outside the tracking station view) the location of survey/site missions. So you could land/fly perfectly without guesswork.
i'd think towards scansat or something, or maybe in the lines of f4? im sure you can set those survey sites as target, and it will show up on the navball though.
Well I used waypoint manager in the past, however it doesn't seem to be found on ckan, and there the latest version is for 1.6
I have it installed on 1.7.3, it works. Go to CKAN menu, set 1.6 version as compatible. Should be able to see and install the mod then.
